songs.comment_text: I am an educator and my students mentioned you can play this song "it's no cussing" I was reluctant at first and then I played the song, and when I listen to the song and heard my students sing to the top of their lungs, It sent chills all over my body because they sung loud and proud with no difficult language....thank you Toosii for putting music back in its place you are exceptional.....
